comment: Easiest class ever. Just do what your told and youll easily pass. Textbook isnt needed at all.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Awesome teacher, super easy to talk to, very fair grader. Always willing to help. I'm taking him again this semester.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Great teacher! Take him if you can
He has a really flat affect, but he's still really funny and easy to talk to. As long as you show up to class and do the work you should be alright as far as grades go.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Super nice and respectful. Makes jokes and the class is very chill. He gives just the right amount of work, not too much or too little. His teaching is very clear, attendance matters to a certain extent. You cant skip all the time but you have a certain number you can miss, and I like that he gives you an exact number you are allowed to miss.
Hillarious as all get out. Very fun and chill class.
